content: /* How many minutes did you spend on walking 2017/02/15 before noon? */SELECT duration, SUM(duration) FROM Activity_log WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '20170215000000' AND '20170215120000' AND act_id = 1;/* How many minutes did you spend on walking 2017/02/15*/SELECT duration, SUM(duration) FROM Activity_log WHERE log_timestamp LIKE '20170215%'AND act_id = 1;
